title: Bug 117981: Item selection issue in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1. [Please mention steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: The item in the library outline view cannot be selected initially.
EB: The item in the library outline view should be selectable on the first attempt.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
